alert.note: Alert for Logan; Rawlins; Thomas; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued December 25 at 3:25PM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Gusty Winds and Low Relative Humidity Sunday... .Although the relative humidity is forecasted to be slightly above criteria, wind gusts of 40-55 MPH and dry vegetation across the region cause concern for rapid fire growth. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 002...014...028...042 AND 079... * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 002 Rawlins... Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas...Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. In Nebraska...Fire Weather Zone 079 Dundy. * Winds...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 17 percent. * Temperatures...Around 60. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
